amendment.description: To extend the Airport and Airway Trust Fund expenditure authority.

vote.text: Amendment SA 922 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 922 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S7814; text: CR S7814) To extend the Airport and Airway Trust Fund expenditure authority.
